00013 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00014 #include <QtDeclarative>
00015 #include "stkdialog.h"
00016 #include "stkmenumodel.h"
00017 
00018 StkDialog::StkDialog(const QString &iconUrl, const QString &title, const QString &qmlViewUrl,
00019                      const QString &defaultText,
00020           const QList<StkMenuItem> &menuItems, const int selection,
00021           QWidget *parent) :
00022     QDialog(parent)
00023 {
00024     // Create QML View as central widget
00025     this->mView = new QDeclarativeView;
00026     this->mView->setSource(QUrl(qmlViewUrl));
00027     this->mView->setResizeMode(QDeclarativeView::SizeRootObjectToView);
00028     QVBoxLayout *layout = new QVBoxLayout;
00029     layout->addWidget(this->mView);
00030     setLayout(layout);
00031     // Find qml objects and connect signals
00032     QObject *object;
00033     QObject *root = this->mView->rootObject();
00034     // Main icon and title
00035     object = root->findChild<QObject*>("icon");
00036     if (object)
00037         object->setProperty("source", iconUrl);
00038     object = root->findChild<QObject*>("title");
00039     if (object)
00040         object->setProperty("text", title);
00041     // SIM Toolkit Menu
00042     QObject * menuView = root->findChild<QObject*>("menuView");
00043     if (menuView) {
00044         // set model "menuModel" for ListView "menuView"
00045         QDeclarativeContext *context = mView->rootContext();
00046         StkMenuModel * menuModel = new StkMenuModel();
00047         menuModel->setMenuItems(menuItems);
00048         context->setContextProperty("menuModel",menuModel);
00049         connect(root, SIGNAL(itemSelected(int)), this, SLOT(responseOkWithSelection(int)));
00050     }
00051     // Text edit / input
00052     QObject * editText = root->findChild<QObject*>("editText");
00053     if (editText) {
00054         editText->setProperty("text",defaultText);
00055         connect(root, SIGNAL(textEntered(QString)), this, SLOT(responseOkWithText(QString)));
00056     }
00057     // End button
00058     object = root->findChild<QObject*>("endRect");
00059     if (object)
00060         connect(root, SIGNAL(endSession()), this, SLOT(responseEnd()));
00061     // Back button
00062     object = root->findChild<QObject*>("backRect");
00063     if (object)
00064         connect(root, SIGNAL(goBack()), this, SLOT(responseBack()));
00065     // Yes button
00066     object = root->findChild<QObject*>("yesRect");
00067     if (object)
00068         connect(root, SIGNAL(accepted()), this, SLOT(responseYes()));
00069     // No button
00070     object = root->findChild<QObject*>("noRect");
00071     if (object)
00072         connect(root, SIGNAL(rejected()), this, SLOT(responseNo()));
00073     // Ok button
00074     object = root->findChild<QObject*>("okRect");
00075     if (object && !menuView && !editText)
00076         connect(root, SIGNAL(accepted()), this, SLOT(responseYes()));
00077     // default response: end session
00078     agentResponse = End;
00079 }
